name: Retro Style Space FPS Demo
description:
• Zombie aliens have invaded your mansion. Kill them all.
  • WASD to move, mouse to look, left mouse click to fire.
  • Get touched by one of them faggot alien zombies and you will restart the level.
  • This is a low-effort retro space FPS game with some known glitches.
  • Fuck you if you don't like it.
  • Fuck you if you like it anyway.
Gripes Aplenty

I'm going to go fishing now. Yes... in the winter time. I kill fish with grenades., and then I haul them in with a net. If you notify the FWS or the Navy I will lob grenades at their agents and/or soldiers, too.

Enough Bullshit

I'm done with this pandemic bullshit already, and ready to leave this sick planet for the glory and the safety of the stars. Who else wants in?
